events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that happened yesterday afternoon at an intersection, requesting immediate claim initiation.
Claim reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a car collision and damages to the insured vehicle.
An insurance agent was assigned to the claim to assist the customer with claim processing and documentation collection.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the customer has been notified about the next steps in assessing the vehicle damage.
Customer was asked to submit accident photos, police report, and vehicle registration documents for claim validation.
Requested documents including photos of the damaged car and official police report were received from the customer promptly.
Investigation team commenced review of the submitted documents and assessed damage reports to determine claim validity.
The investigation concluded confirming the legitimacy of the car accident and damage claims as reported by the customer.
Based on investigation results, a settlement amount to cover repair costs for the vehicle has been proposed to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and confirmed acceptance to proceed with payment.
The claim has been officially approved for payment following the customer's acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment corresponding to the approved settlement amount has been processed and issued to the customer's bank account.
The claim case has been closed successfully after payment issuance and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
All claim related documents and case files have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
